scripts.logs: bash -c 'LOG_DIR="sdd/system-logs"; if [ ! -d "$LOG_DIR" ]; then echo "No logs found."; exit 0; fi; LATEST=$(ls -t "$LOG_DIR"/*.log 2>/dev/null | head -n1); if [ -z "$LATEST" ]; then echo "No log files found in $LOG_DIR"; exit 0; fi; echo "Tailing: $LATEST"; tail -f "$LATEST" | npx pino-pretty'
